column3: Aiming increases the chances of successfully hitting a target.
A meditative state used to focus powerful inner energies.
When someone is berserk, they hit harder but get hit more often.
Bleeding can adversely affect various stat pools.  It can be stopped if a medic successfully applies First Aid.
While blinded, combat accuracy falls dramatically.
Blocking - Cut - Please bug report this string if seen in game.
This displays if a player, NPC, or creature is in combat.
Cover gives a defensive bonus and allows the use of Surprise Shot.  It makes its benefactor immobile unless they have Sneak.
Disease can cause wounds to various attributes, and generally causes these wounds slowly.  It can be cured if a doctor successfully uses Cure Disease medicines.
Being dizzy makes it possible to fall down when changing postures.
Driving a vehicle limits what additional actions you can attempt.
A feigned death can trick enemies into believing that their target is really dead.
When one is frozen, they are unable to run or walk.
When one is immobilized, they are unable to run or walk.
Those who are intimidated do not hit as often.
A masked scent may prevent aggressive creatures from attacking players who approach them.
Meditate
Currently carrying a rider.
Fire!!  This quickly damages stat pools while also creating wound damage.
Peace shows that somebody has ceased hostilities towards their combat target.
Piloting a ship allows space travel and combat.
Poison can adversely affect various stat pools, and causes its damage rather quickly.  It can be cured if a doctor successfully uses Cure Poison medicine.
Rallied is a group-wide bonus to hit percentage.
Riding a mount limits what additional actions you can attempt.
Sitting on a chair.
Sneaking allows you to slowly move around while Taking Cover.
The stunned state takes away a round of combat and temporarily lowers some stats.
Swimming allows you to wade through deep water.
A Temporary Enemy Flag is acquired when you perform an action which temporarily makes you an enemy of some faction.
Tumbling gives a defensive bonus to whoever is in that state.
Inside a starship interior.
Manning a weapon on a starship.
Piloting a ship allows space travel and combat.
While using the Ship Operations station, a pilot can execute special abilities and droid programs.
